title: "The Office"
output: github_document
params:
  season: 1
---

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r import-data, include=FALSE}
ratings <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-03-17/office_ratings.csv")
ratings_list <- split(ratings, ratings$season)
season <- ratings_list[[params$season]]
```

# Overview

Season `r params$season` of *`r rmarkdown::metadata$title`* premiered on `r min(season$air_date)`, and had `r n_distinct(season$episode)` episodes.

# Ratings

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.align='center'}
ggplot(season, aes(x = episode, y = imdb_rating)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(
    x = "Episode", 
    y = "IMDB rating"
  ) +
  expand_limits(y = 0) 
```
